name: Will Flor
description:
Will Flor is a platformer where you play as a man named william who travels in time to kill fate! each level is split to 3 sides, A side, B side and C side. A side is a simple stage, B side is a twisted and complicated version of that stage, C side is the boss stage.

this demo has 5 levels. and only has the base platforming features. there's a ton of features i'm planning on adding to the full game:

  • world map.
  • vault that stores all your points when you beat the level.
  • you don't have to worry about putting your points in the vault since it gets filled up automatically after beating each level.
  • you get 3000 free points when starting any level but you can add as much as you want from the vault (optional).
  • an amount of points is required for unlocking each level, fe: Level 2 requires 2500 vault points, level 3 requires 4000 vault points.

right now, i'm the only person working on this game so a donation would be really appreciated.
